kmer.help: The k_mer argument (an integer from 2 to 11, default: 5)

pathk.help: The path kmerX argument (default: 'lib' in the current directory)

pathf.help: The path features argument (default: 'lib/target' in the current directory)

output.help: The output results path argument (default: 'results' in the current directory)

entry.help: The argument that defines the type of entry of the ml model (default = 'kmer')
